Plugin.Author: Sudospective
Plugin.LoadCommand:
%xero(function(self)
function inverseEase(easefunc) return function(t) return inverse(easefunc(t)) end end
inverseSine = inverseEase(inOutSine) inverseQuad = inverseEase(inOutQuad) inverseCubic = inverseEase(inOutCubic) inverseQuart = inverseEase(inOutQuart) inverseQuint = inverseEase(inOutQuint) inverseExpo = inverseEase(inOutExpo) inverseCirc = inverseEase(inOutCirc) inverseBack = inverseEase(inOutBack) inverseBounce = inverseEase(inOutBounce) inverseElastic = inverseEase(inOutElastic)
end)
